item.text: Now the Pharisees and some of the experts in the law who came from Jerusalem gathered around him.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> that <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus’</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2068" class="">ate</st> their <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> with <st data-num="2839" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>, <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, <st data-num="449" class="">unwashed</st>.

(<st data-num="1063">For</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="1437 3361">unless</st> they <st data-num="4435">perform a ritual</st> <st data-num="3538" class="">washing</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2902" class="">holding fast</st> to the <st data-num="3862" class="">tradition</st> of the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> when they come <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="58" class="">marketplace</st>,<n id="1" /> they do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="3362">unless</st> they <st data-num="907" class="">wash</st>. They <st data-num="2902">hold fast</st> to <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="243" class="">other</st> <st data-num="3739 3880">traditions</st>: the <st data-num="909" class="">washing</st> of <st data-num="4221" class="">cups</st>, <st data-num="3582" class="">pots</st>, <st data-num="5473" class="">kettles</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2825">dining couches</st>.<n id="2" />)<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st> <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1223 5101" class="">Why</st> do <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4043" class="">live</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="3862" class="">tradition</st> of the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st><n id="1" /> with <st data-num="2839" class="">unwashed</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st>?”

He said to them, “Isaiah prophesied correctly about you hypocrites, as it is written:

“‘This people honors me with their lips,

but their hearts are far from me.

They worship me in vain,

teaching as doctrine the commandments of men.’
Having no regard for the command of God, you hold fast to human tradition.”

He <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “You <st data-num="2573" class="">neatly</st> <st data-num="114" class="">reject</st> the <st data-num="1785" class="">commandment</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2443">in order to</st> <st data-num="2476">set up</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3862" class="">tradition</st>.
For Moses said, ‘Honor your father and your mother,’ and, ‘Whoever insults his father or mother must be put to death.’
But you say that if anyone tells his father or mother, ‘Whatever help you would have received from me is corban’ (that is, a gift for God),

then you <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="863" class="">permit</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">anything</st> for his <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>.
Thus you nullify the word of God by your tradition that you have handed down. And you do many things like this.”
Then he called the crowd again and said to them, “Listen to me, everyone, and understand.
There is nothing outside of a person that can defile him by going into him. Rather, it is what comes out of a person that defiles him.”
Now when Jesus had left the crowd and entered the house, his disciples asked him about the parable.

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="1510" class="">Are</st> <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">so</st> <st data-num="801" class="">foolish</st>? <st data-num="3756" class="">Don’t</st> you <st data-num="3340">understand</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">whatever</st> <st data-num="1531" class="">goes</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> <st data-num="1855">from outside</st> <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="2840" class="">defile</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>?

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> it does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1531" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> his <st data-num="2836" class="">stomach</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> then <st data-num="1607">goes out</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="856" class="">sewer</st>.”<n id="1" /> (This means <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1033" class="">foods</st> are <st data-num="2511" class="">clean.)</st><n id="2" />

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3588">What</st> <st data-num="1607">comes out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">person</st> <st data-num="2840" class="">defiles</st> <st data-num="444" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2081" class="">from within</st>, <st data-num="1537">out of</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">human</st> <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st>, <st data-num="1607" class="">come</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="1261" class="">ideas</st>, <st data-num="4202">sexual immorality</st>, <st data-num="2829" class="">theft</st>, <st data-num="5408" class="">murder</st>,

<st data-num="3430" class="">adultery</st>, <st data-num="4124" class="">greed</st>, <st data-num="4189" class="">evil</st>, <st data-num="1388" class="">deceit</st>, <st data-num="766" class="">debauchery</st>, <st data-num="3788" class="">envy</st>, <st data-num="988" class="">slander</st>, <st data-num="5243" class="">pride</st>, and <st data-num="877" class="">folly</st>.
All these evils come from within and defile a person.”
After Jesus left there, he went to the region of Tyre. When he went into a house, he did not want anyone to know, but he was not able to escape notice.

<st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st>, a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> whose <st data-num="2365">young daughter</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> an <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2117" class="">immediately</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> and <st data-num="4363" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>.

The <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="1674" class="">Greek</st>, of <st data-num="4949" class="">Syrophoenician</st> <st data-num="1085" class="">origin</st>. She<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2065" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1544" class="">cast</st> the <st data-num="1140" class="">demon</st> <st data-num="1537">out of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2364" class="">daughter</st>.

He <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="863">Let</st> the <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st> be <st data-num="5526" class="">satisfied</st> <st data-num="4413">first</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2570" class="">right</st> to <st data-num="2983" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="5043">children’s</st> <st data-num="740" class="">bread</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="906" class="">throw</st> it to the <st data-num="2952" class="">dogs</st>.”<n id="1" />

She <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, “Yes, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="2532">but even</st> the <st data-num="2952" class="">dogs</st> <st data-num="5270" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="5132" class="">table</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="3813">children’s</st> <st data-num="5589" class="">crumbs</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="1223">Because</st> you <st data-num="3056" class="">said</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, you may <st data-num="5217" class="">go</st>. The <st data-num="1140" class="">demon</st> has <st data-num="1831" class="">left</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2364" class="">daughter</st>.”
She went home and found the child lying on the bed, and the demon gone.
Then Jesus went out again from the region of Tyre and came through Sidon to the Sea of Galilee in the region of the Decapolis.

They <st data-num="5342" class="">brought</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> a <st data-num="2974" class="">deaf man</st> who had <st data-num="3424">difficulty speaking</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they <st data-num="3870" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2007" class="">place</st> his <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> <st data-num="2007">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

After Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="618" class="">took</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="618">aside</st> <st data-num="2398" class="">privately</st>, <st data-num="575">away from</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st>, he <st data-num="906" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1147" class="">fingers</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">man’s</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3775" class="">ears</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> after <st data-num="4429" class="">spitting</st>, he <st data-num="681" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue</st>.<n id="3" />
Then he looked up to heaven and said with a sigh, “Ephphatha” (that is, “Be opened”).

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="2112">immediately</st> the <st data-num="846" class="">man’s</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="189" class="">ears</st> were <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st>, <st data-num="846">his</st> <st data-num="1100" class="">tongue</st> <st data-num="3089" class="">loosened</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="3723" class="">plainly</st>.

Jesus <st data-num="1291" class="">ordered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="3367">anyone</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">as much as</st> he <st data-num="1291" class="">ordered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> not to do this, they <st data-num="2784" class="">proclaimed</st> it <st data-num="4053" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st>.<n id="1" />
People were completely astounded and said, “He has done everything well. He even makes the deaf hear and the mute speak.”
